What to Bring I recommend that you bring: - BYOB - or whatever you like to drink - Towels for outside - Flashlight - River shoes and swimsuits - extra snacks - Sunscreen and bug spray - Any musical instrument you can use by the campfire - camp chair

Directions The cabins are a couple of miles past Smoke Hole Caverns on Rt. 55 on the left hand side. The right turn for Dolly Sods (marked with a sign) is 200 yards before the left turn into the cabins.
